Claire

CLAIRE

2 King size beds + 7 days

Travel 4 2 King size beds Large Storage Space 2,3m x 5,5m 3,2m
Seasons
99€/day 105€/day 120€/day 135€/day 140€/day

DESCRIPTION

Claire was designed to easily fit a family or group of 4 persons. It is incredible how it can provide a table for 5 persons and 2 kind size beds, with only 6,5 meter long. The kitchen is fully equipped with a sink, fridge (that works on 12v, 220v or gas) and 3 points cooker. The WC includes a very simple to operate chemical toilet and a convertible shower cabin, with a good pressure and hot water.

HIGHLIGHTS

For the entertainment, you have a 22’ Samsung LED TV, with HDMI and USB input for you to connect your laptop or take some movies on a USB pen. Regarding electricity, the motorhome is fully self-sustainable, with its large solar panel, the batteries charge during the day to provide you with all the necessary energy for the evening. Additionally all the lights are LED, to take the maximum from the battery. You can charge your mobile phones and tables on the multiple USB charging ports available, or you can use the 300W power inverter to charge your laptop.

HUGE GARAGE AND BIG SHOWER SPACE

You can bring all your luggages or equipment and fit it easily on the big rear garage.Below the king size bed there is a spacious storage space. Claire also includes a full shower where the shower space is separated from the bathroom space through an acrylic panel. Although this motorhome is small in size, it includes all the amenities of a large motorhome, fully equipped kitchen, fridge with freezer included, wardrobe, TV, dining space for 5 people.
